name: gallery-itsaeditmodel
description: Plugin for Y.Model that makes Y.Model-instances able to change their properties through UI-form-elements.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: formelements
examples.description: This example shows how to create formelements of basic elementtypes.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: widgets
examples.description: This example creates a formelement in the form of a widget. A boolean property will be rendered as a ITSACheckbox-instance.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: buttons
examples.description: This example creates a savebutton that makes the modelinstance to save through its synclayer and fire a model:saveclick
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: all-properties
examples.description: This example creates an object using toJSON(), which can be used by Y.Lang.sub().
author: itsasbreuk
